ygData.subject: Re: DEX
ygData.msgSnippet: i believe Dex makes you miss less when meleeing, and according to J.M. s post last week, only charisma is used to calculate our mana. Shada Silverleaf, Level
ygData.messageBody:
i believe Dex makes you miss less when meleeing, and according to J.M.'s
post last week, only charisma is used to calculate our mana.

Shada Silverleaf, Level 47 Bard, Mithaniel Marr


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Codo the Mysterious [mailto:codo@...]
> Sent: Friday, June 25, 1999 5:14 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] DEX
>
>
> From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
> OK, kind of on topic, kind of off topic...But I'll word it as
> best I can for
> on-topic! :-)
>
> In what way does a high DEX help a Bard?
>
> I currently have something like a 125 or so in DEX...(Who me? Own DEX
> boosting items? Naw.....) Actually, I dumped as many of my
> starting points
> into DEX as I could, and then added 2 Cutthroat Rings,
> Snakeskin Gloves, and
> a Dragoon Dirk....
>
> What skills are made better by high DEX? Does this affect my
> AC any? (I
> wondered if it did though, because I bought 2 Brass Earrings,
> rated at 2AC
> each, and when I put them on, they actually gave me a total of 7AC
> increase...)
>
> I beleive that I read somewhere that Mana for Bard's is
> DEX/CHA based...Is
> this correct?
>
> Thanks,
> Lueln
> 10th Rank
> Solusek Ro
>
>
>
